title: Ep. 69 - Back Up the Truck On Tech?
itunes:title: Back Up the Truck On Tech?
description: Tech veteran Chris Umiastowski talks about the explosive growth potential in the tablet market. Extreme Value Editor Dan Ferris tells us why you should back up the truck on MSFT.
